channel.title: Looking for a few folks to do a 15 minute usability test on our software
channel.description:
Hi folks. We're updating our web app in the next few days and I wanted to do a bit more usability testing on the UI.
I'm happy to provide the same in return (either for your product or your website).
I'm on New York time and most times between 9am and 8pm will work for me in the next few days.
This is speech therapy software. And we'd do it via screen share, either Skype or Zoom.us or Teamviewer.

item.title: Looking for a few folks to do a 15 minute usability test on our software
item.dc:creator: Clay_Nichols
item.description:
Yep.

What kind of device do you want to use?
What id your time zone? (or nearest major city)

I normally do testing on Tues-Thursday, but would be up for other times as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a few folks to do a 15 minute usability test on our software

item.title: Looking for a few folks to do a 15 minute usability test on our software
item.dc:creator: startrinity
item.description:
Hi Clay, do you still need it?

Read full topic
